testcase.classname: Free CRM login test and image upload feature
testcase.name: Free CRM Login test
testcase.system-out: Given : user is already on login page.......................................passed When : title of the login page is FREE CRM..................................passed When : we click on the login button.........................................passed Then : user enters "ppritesh.sinha@gmail.com" and "Bng$20167"..............passed Then : user clicks on login button..........................................passed And : user is on home page..................................................passed When : user mouse hover on New Contact Link.................................passed Then : user creating new contact by entering "ITC1 Test" and "Automation1" and "testdata1@itc.com" and "testjava 1" and upload picture.passed Then : click on save buttton................................................passed Then : user mouse hover on New Contact Link to confirm the contact is added.passed Then : Close the browser....................................................passed
